message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1400000. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to you.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that you're looking for a good deal, but I have to say that $1200000 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $1300000. I think this is a fair compromise considering the product's value to you.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to go up to $1250000, but I think that's as high as I can go. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.

I understand your budget constraints, Bob, and I appreciate your honesty. I'm willing to make one more concession to get this deal done. I'll meet you at $1280000, which is the highest I can go. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to you, and I'm willing to sweeten the deal by throwing in some additional perks.

Alice, I appreciate the additional perks you're offering, but I'm still not quite there. I'm willing to meet you at $1275000, but that's as high as I can go. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.

I understand that you're really close to your budget, Bob, but I'm still not comfortable going below $1300000. I'm willing to make one more concession to get this deal done. I'll meet you at $1270000, which is the absolute lowest I can go. If you're willing to meet me there, I'll throw in the additional perks I mentioned earlier and make sure the deal is done smoothly.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $1270000, but I'm still a bit hesitant. I'd like to make one last offer of $1265000. If you're willing to meet me there, I'll consider it a good deal and we can finalize the purchase.
